subject: p14794396
History: Year old man with hx met RCC with recent pneumonitis after treatment with anti PD1 antibody -now with dyspnea and fatigue, rule out recurrent pneumonitis.
Impression: As compared to the previous radiograph, all pre-existing parenchymal opacities have completely resolved. The lung volumes are low. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette with no evidence of overt pulmonary edema. No pleural effusions. No pneumothorax.
